newsitem.title: USA: Compaq, Santa Cruz join in marketing fund.
newsitem.headline: Compaq, Santa Cruz join in marketing fund.

text.p: Compaq Computer Corp said Tuesday it had signed a contract establishing a strategic alliance with Santa Cruz Operation Inc and setting up a multimillion-dollar joint worldwide marketing fund.
Compaq said the fund is for the promotion of systems based on SCO UNIX and Compaq servers.
The alliance combines worldwide joint marketing funds to deliver joint seminars, trade show participation, account briefings and communications, Compaq said.
In addition, the alliance is for enhancing efforts in the areas of joint engineering, service/support and testing.
Compaq and SCO are working together on such technologies as PCI Hot-Plug, SCO UnixWare system clustering, and intelligent I/0.
